name: LaboratoryTestsForHypertension
title: Laboratory Tests for Hypertension
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent laboratory tests that are commonly used with patients diagnosed with hypertension.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with laboratory testing for patients diagnosed with hypertension.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Basic metabolic 1998 panel - Serum or Plasma
Basic metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
Comprehensive metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
Renal function 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
CBC W Auto Differential panel - Blood
CBC with Ordered Manual Differential panel - Blood
Complete blood count (hemogram) panel - Blood by Automated count
